description: Tap for HELP is an app that anyone can use anywhere to locate common sources for non-emergency help. It uses GPS to locate Police, Urgent Care Clinic, Fire, Towing, Auto Parts, Poison Control Center, Pet Hospital, Taxis, Gas Stations ATM, Post Office, Pharmacy, Cleaners and more near your location and provides you with the contact information or directions to get the help you need quickly and easily.  Tap for HELP also provides a quick "DIAL 911" on every page that can get you the emergency help you need in as few as two taps in the same place on your screen.  So the next time you are running low on fuel, are stranded on the side of the highway with car trouble or need the nearest ATM just Tap for HELP!
